inclusion.banner: Everyone belongs here. Daily Vibe Check welcomes people of all backgrounds, identities, and experiences including the LGBTQ+ community.

crisis.banner: Emergency? If you're in immediate danger, call 911 or your local emergency services. Daily Vibe Check isn't therapy and can't provide emergency care.
crisis.title: Crisis Resources
crisis.subtitle: You don't have to face this alone. Help is available 24/7.

rooms.rules_chip: Be kind • No bullying • No explicit content

guardian.subject: Verify your connection to {{childName}}
guardian.verification_request: {{childName}} is setting up a Vibe Check account and needs your verification.
guardian.expires: This code will expire in 15 minutes.
guardian.ignore: If you didn't request this, you can safely ignore this email.

data_export.subject: Your Vibe Check Data Export is Ready
data_export.expires_on: This download link will expire on {{date}}.

data_deletion.subject_scheduled: Your Data Deletion Request Has Been Received
data_deletion.subject_completed: Your Vibe Check Data Has Been Deleted
data_deletion.scheduled_body: We've received your request to delete your Vibe Check account and data.
data_deletion.scheduled_warning: Important: Your data will be permanently deleted on {{date}}.
data_deletion.scheduled_grace: You have a 7-day grace period to cancel this request. After that, your data will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
data_deletion.scheduled_cancel: To cancel this deletion, please log in to your account before the scheduled date.
data_deletion.completed_body: This confirms that all your Vibe Check data has been permanently deleted as requested.
data_deletion.completed_removed: The following data has been removed:
data_deletion.completed_thanks: Thank you for using Vibe Check. We hope we were able to support your wellness journey.

common.footer: Vibe Check - Mental Wellness for All Ages
